channel.title: My server has gone down!
channel.description:
My server was online yesterday with people playing but today nobody can connect and it says the port is closed on a port checker butnothing has changed since yesterday but the only thing that i did yesterday was ban two people from playing cause they were trying to dupe and were noclipping.
Please help!

item.title: My server has gone down!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

No problem. Also, you can follow my tutorial on setting a static IP Address so this doesn’t happen again.

Read full topic

item.title: My server has gone down!
item.dc:creator: @canio22 canio22
item.description:
@canio22 wrote:

ok internal ip changed thx.

Read full topic

item.title: My server has gone down!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Either your external or internal IP address changed. If it was internal, just re-portfoward using your new LAN Address. If it was external, change your no-ip to work with your new address.

Read full topic

item.title: My server has gone down!
item.dc:creator: @canio22 canio22
item.description:
@canio22 wrote:

the port is still open.
the bill is payed cause i can still use internet…
and i have made a new acc with no-ip and it still wont let me.

Read full topic

item.title: My server has gone down!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

If the port checker says the port is closed, then re open it?

Also, make sure your router hasn’t been reset, this can change your Ip address this means you’ll have to update your no-ip. Ask your parents if they’ve recently payed the bill, my ISP seems to enjoy changing my Ip every time the bill is payed. A part from that try looking for server errors, or any connection faults.

Read full topic
